people.title: Paul Virilio
people.figcaption: The one who lived and understood technology is more important than humans.

people.figcaption: A biologist acting God and creating synthetic life.

title: A Way Of Creating And Enjoying Knowledge

people.title: Dostoevsky

people.quote: we never had any caprice or will of our own

people.name: barabasi
people.title: Albert Laszlo Barabasi
people.figcaption: Like Betrand Russell for the XXth, perhaps he knows the essence of this century.
people.quote: think yourself as a dreaming robot on autopilot

people.name: samuel-butler
people.title: Samuel Butler
people.quote: Advertising is the way we grant power to the machines.
